```{r sequence}
seq(2,10)
seq.Date(as.Date("2010/1/1"),as.Date("2010/2/3"),by=3,length.out = NULL)
seq(1,9,by=pi)
seq_len(length.out = 3)
number = as.integer(readline(pr="Enter any valid number: "))
if((number %% 2) == 0) 
  {
print(paste(number,"is an Even number"))
} else 
  {
print(paste(number,"is an Odd number"))
}
seq_len(22)
seq.default(from=10, to=17, by=((16-14)/(length.out-1)))
```
